posts.post_content:
Hello everyone!

I'm new to the hobby and I'm looking for a few raw T206 cards as a starter set for me. My budget is about $60 give or take. I can go higher, but considering that I am a college student, my budget is really limited. However, if I get offered a really nice price and if you want a Bowman Chrome Justin Verlander XFractor Rookie Auto(graded), then I can do a trade+cash :)


Thanks a lot for reading!
John
good luck, you made a good decision!!!
Thanks for all of those who messaged me!
Collecting T206 cards is a sickness.  Be very carefull :)

I believe you are correct in calling it a sickness!  I just purchased my 1st      T206 card(a common) in very eye appealing condition.  I can tell this is going to get addicting, time consuming, and oh yeah...expensive:eek:
